security: Revealing the details of the Coben plan and the investigation into Luis CONTE could jeopardize ongoing operations, expose intelligence sources, and potentially harm U.S. relations with other countries. Directly quoting: 'Coben plan to expose Luis CONTE agent as cin agent'.
summary: An outgoing message from the CIA's Staff to Frankfurt and Bonny, concerning VUMAGNA-1 and inquiries about Enrique's family plans related to CONTE, as well as referencing the Coben plan to expose Luis CONTE as a CIN agent.
summary_one_paragraph: This outgoing message, dated February 13, 1975, is directed from the CIA's Staff to the Frankfurt and Bonny stations, referencing the RYBAT AZULE VUMAGNA CABELL operation. It instructs the recipients to inquire with VUMAGNA-1 about the plans of Enrique's family in relation to CONTE, specifically asking if she knows when they plan to act and whether it seems imminent or later. Additionally, it references FILE (56-6-42/3) E2, IMPDET and the Coben plan to expose Luis CONTE as a CIN agent.
title: Inquiry Regarding Enrique's Family Plans and CONTE; Coben Plan Reference
